itunes:title: MONEY WITH MICHELLE!
title: MONEY WITH MICHELLE!
description: In today’s episode Jessi and Stew interview Jessi’s dad and this episode is all about moneyyy! Meet Daddy Styles aka "Michelle" Tim Draper, my dad and business partner who handles everything financial at JZ Styles! While a lot of businesses, especially salons, suffered in 2020, JZ Styles Co was able to not only stay alive in 2020 but totally THRIVE thanks to his money management and smarts! With tax season right around the corner, Tim is dispensing GOLD and sharing how stylists, or any entrepreneur, can save money, manage money, and what you can and CAN'T write off throughout the year! This is episode 1 of "Money With Michelle" and we hope you love it so we can make it a regular series on the pod!
